name: Mood Tracker - Notion Template
description: Understand your emotions, moods, and feelings better with this Mood Tracker template. A simple way to track your mood, this Notion template makes it easy to understand your mood, why your mood changes, and what influences your mood. This template includesA table view for you to track your moodA calendar view to identify patterns & trends in your mood on a monthly basisA list view to keep track of notable moments in your life.
features: Atable viewfor you to track your mood; Acalendar viewto identify patterns & trends in your mood on a monthly basis; Alist viewto keep track of notable moments in your life.
